title: Melinda Garrett, MA, LPCC-S, TCADC
description: Melinda Garrett, MA, LPCC-S, TCADC, is a licensed professional clinical counselor and clinical alcohol and drug counselor.
cleaned_text: Melinda Garrett, MA, LPCC-S, TCADC Addiction Medicine Offers Video Visits Locations for Melinda Garrett, MA, LPCC-S, TCADC - Map pinA Manchester - AdventHealth Primary Care Clinic Expertise of Melinda Garrett, MA, LPCC-S, TCADC - Biography - Melinda Garrett, MA, LPCC-S, TCADC, is a licensed professional clinical counselor and clinical alcohol and drug counselor. In fourth grade, Melinda was fascinated by the work of Sigmund Freud and aspired to become a psychotherapist herself. She has always wanted to help people heal, understand themselves better, and feel less alone. This desire to empower others guides the compassionate care she gives each of her patients. Melinda graduated from Eastern Kentucky University as a member of the National Honor Society. She has had special training in hypnosis, eye movement desensitization and reprocessing (EMDR), accelerated resolution therapy (ART), and cognitive behavioral therapy (CBT). Melinda enjoys various hobbies outside of her work in behavioral health, including listening to music and being in nature, especially the mountains. - Care Philosophy - Melinda has been personally and professionally invested in the Jackson County community and its people for 15 years. She is committed to providing quality behavioral health services that help patients heal their bodies, minds, and spirits. - Areas Served - Manchester, KY - Languages Spoken - English - Ages Accepted - AdultsGeriatrics Insurances accepted by Melinda Garrett, MA, LPCC-S, TCADC Disclaimer: The list below is for reference purposes only and is subject to change.
